params._batchIndexToLockIn: index of the batch in which to start locking.
params._extendPeriod: the period to extend the locking. in batchTime.

getLockingIdScore(uint256,uint256).details: getLockingIdScore function return score of lockingId at specific bach index

getRepRewardPerBatch(uint256).details: getRepRewardPerBatch function the calculation is done the following formula: RepReward =  repRewardConstA * (repRewardConstB**_batchIndex)

params._batchIndex: the index of the batch to calc rep reward of

params._agreementHash: is a hash of agreement required to be added to the TX by participants
params._avatar: the avatar to mint reputation from
params._batchesIndexCap: the length of the locking period (in batches).       This value capped by BATCHES_HARDCAP .
params._maxLockingBatches: - maximum number of locking batches that a user can lock (or extend) her tokens for
params._redeemEnableTime: redeem enable time, in seconds since epoch       redeem reputation can be done after this time.
params._repRewardConstA: - the total amount of reputation allocation per batch is calculated by :  _repRewardConstA * ((_repRewardConstB/1000) ** batchIndex)
params._repRewardConstB: - the total amount of reputation allocation per batch is calculated by :  _repRewardConstA * ((_repRewardConstB/1000) ** batchIndex). _repRewardConstB must be < 1000
params._reputationReward: the total amount of reputation that can be minted by this contract
params._startTime: locking period start time, in seconds since epoch

params._amount: the amount of token to lock
params._batchIndexToLockIn: the batch index in which the locking period starts. Must be the currently active batch.
params._period: the number of batches that the tokens will be locked for
